tool.help:
rpReport =========
Generates HTML pages to explore the main characteristics (thermodynamics, fluxes, number of metabolic steps, reaction rule score) of pathways predicted with `RetroPath suite <https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1096717617301337>`_.
Input -----
Required:
* **Source SBML**: rpSBML file(s) containing pathways predicted with RetroPath suite.
Output ------
* **Pathways HTML Report**: Pathways HTML Report
